Title: Hillbilly Elegy
Writer: J.D. Vance (based on the book by), Vanessa Taylor
Actors: Amy Adams, Glenn Close, Gabriel Basso, Haley Bennett
Plot: An urgent phone call pulls a Yale Law student back to his Ohio hometown, where he reflects on three generations of family history and his own future.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 5 wins & 29 nominations.
